complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down monorepo setup into: 1) Create directory structure (apps/, packages/, supabase/), 2) Configure root package.json with Bun workspaces, 3) Move existing content to apps/frontend/, 4) Validate workspace configuration and commands work correctly.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Low complexity since Bun is already in use. Basic directory creation and package.json updates. No complex dependency management needed.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create shared types package: 1) Extract existing Supabase types to packages/shared/, 2) Create API DTOs for request/response interfaces, 3) Build Zod validation schemas, 4) Define application enums and constants, 5) Configure proper package exports and TypeScript compilation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-low complexity. Database types already exist and are comprehensive. Main work is reorganizing and adding validation schemas.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Build comprehensive notification system: 1) Create Supabase Edge Functions for notifications, 2) Implement notification scheduling service, 3) Set up web push notification handlers, 4) Integrate email notification service, 5) Build notification preferences management, 6) Create notification delivery tracking and retry logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple notification channels, Edge Functions deployment, web push setup, and complex scheduling logic.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create AI service backend: 1) Design AI service abstraction layer, 2) Implement OpenAI provider integration, 3) Implement Anthropic provider integration, 4) Build care plan generation algorithms, 5) Create feeding and training recommendation engines with context processing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity. Requires API integrations, prompt engineering, and domain-specific algorithms for pet care recommendations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Reorganize existing UI components: 1) Move current shadcn/ui components to packages/ui/, 2) Configure build process and exports for UI package, 3) Update import paths across the application to use the new package structure.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very low complexity. All components already exist and are well-implemented. Just needs reorganization into package structure.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Build puppy management interface: 1) Create puppy registration wizard with multi-step form, 2) Build breed selection with autocomplete and validation, 3) Implement photo upload with crop/resize functionality, 4) Create puppy profile view/edit forms, 5) Build weight tracking charts using recharts, 6) Implement medical history forms with validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity. Requires complex forms, file upload handling, charting integration, and comprehensive validation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create calendar and events system: 1) Implement calendar component using react-day-picker, 2) Build event creation/editing modal forms, 3) Implement recurring event logic and UI, 4) Create vaccination schedule interface, 5) Build appointment management with reminders, 6) Integrate with backend event APIs and real-time updates.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to calendar integration, recurring event logic, complex date/time handling, and real-time synchronization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Build feeding management interface: 1) Create feeding schedule forms with time pickers, 2) Build meal logging interface with quick actions, 3) Implement portion tracking charts with recharts, 4) Create feeding history visualization and analytics, 5) Build feeding reminders and notification integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity. Requires time-based scheduling, charting, and integration with notification system.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create training management system: 1) Build training exercise library with search/filter, 2) Implement progress tracking with charts and milestones, 3) Create training session scheduler, 4) Build milestone tracking UI with progress indicators, 5) Implement exercise video player components, 6) Create training recommendation interface.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity. Requires search/filter functionality, video handling, progress tracking algorithms, and complex data visualization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create AI care plan interface: 1) Build care plan display components with sections and organization, 2) Implement AI recommendation UI with accept/reject actions, 3) Build care plan customization interface, 4) Create feedback collection forms for AI improvement.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-low complexity. UI-focused task with existing patterns. Main challenge is presenting AI-generated content in user-friendly way.
